# Share Term [Blog](http://share-term.me) [![Donate now][donate-now]][paypal-donations]

The share-term.me content.

If you want to contribute to the http://share-term.me website, this is the place where you should do it. Send us pull requests!


[![share-term-blog](http://i.imgur.com/5zpClQJ.png)](#)




## Installation




```sh
$ npm i share-term-blog
```

Have an idea? Found a bug? See [how to contribute][contributing].
